name: Brexit Bus
description:
During the Brexit referendum the Leave campaign drove around in a bus promising savings of £350 million a week that could go to the national health service if the UK would leave the EU.  

Now you can relieve those campaigning glory days by driving your own bus and growing your promise until enough people vote leave. All you need to do is tell them what they want to hear.

Note:  Works on Chrome well, on Firefox it takes time to start.
Safari and Edge don't work
